ability.desc: Akali dashes in a line through the most enemies, dealing 275 magic damage and marking them for 7 seconds. When a marked target drops below 20% Health, Akali dashes again and executes them, dealing 275 magic damage to enemies she passes through.
ability.name: Perfect Execution

ability.desc: Blitzcrank pulls the farthest enemy, dealing 200 magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. His next attack knocks them up for 1 second. Allies within range will prefer attacking Blitzcrank's target.
ability.name: Rocket Grab

ability.desc: Braum slams his vault door into the ground, creating a fissure towards his target. Enemies within 2 hexes of Braum, and those struck by the fissure, are stunned for 2.5 seconds and take 100 magic damage.
ability.name: Vault Breaker

ability.desc: Caitlyn takes aim at the farthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals 800 magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
ability.name: Ace in the Hole

ability.desc: Camille gains a shield blocking 100 damage over 4 seconds, then sweeps her leg, dealing 25 magic damage to enemies in a cone. While this shield holds, Camille's attacks restore 10 Health.
ability.name: Defensive Sweep

ability.desc: Cho'Gath devours the lowest Health enemy within range, dealing 800 magic damage. If this kills the target, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, up to 20. Each stack of Feast permanently grants 2% bonus Health and size.
ability.name: Feast

ability.desc: Darius swings his axe in a circle, dealing 125 magic damage, then heals himself 100 Health for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Decimate

ability.desc: Dr. Mundo injects himself with "medicine", restoring 35% of his maximum Health and becoming energized for 5 seconds. While energized, he restores an additional 30% of his maximum Health over the duration and deals 10 magic damage to a random nearby enemy each second. When the "medicine" expires, Dr. Mundo expels a burst of electricity that deals 0.05 of his current Health as magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.
ability.name: Zap Dose

ability.desc: Ekko invokes an afterimage that bats a device towards the largest group of units. Upon landing, it deals 75 magic damage to enemies within and applies 35% reduced Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Allies inside gain 0.4 Attack Speed for 4 seconds.
ability.name: Parallel Convergence

ability.desc: Ezreal fires a missile at his target, dealing 150% of his Attack Damage plus 25 bonus physical damage. If the missile hits, he grants himself bonus stacking Attack Speed, at 5 stacks.
ability.name: Mystic Shot

ability.desc: Fiora becomes untargetable and strikes 4 times at her target's vitals. Each strike deals 160% of her Attack Damage as physical damage, 75 bonus true damage, and heals her for 15% of the total damage dealt. If the target dies, Fiora will change targets to the nearest enemy.
ability.name: Blade Waltz

ability.desc:
Galio becomes invulnerable and leaps into the sky before crashing down on the largest group of enemies. Enemies within a large radius take 150 magic damage and are knocked into the sky. The lower the enemy's maximum Health is compared to Galio's, the further they are knocked up.

Passive: Galio's Critical Strikes slam the ground, dealing 80 bonus magic damage to enemies around his target.
ability.name: Colossal Entrance

ability.desc: Gangplank attacks his target with his gun, dealing 170% of his Attack Damage plus 110 bonus physical damage. If this attack kills a champion, Gangplank plunders 1 gold.
ability.name: Parrrley

ability.desc: Garen shrugs off all crowd control effects, empowering his next strike to deal 200% of his Attack Damage, plus an additional 0.20 of his missing Health in bonus physical damage. This Ability can be cast while stunned.
ability.name: Decisive Strike

ability.desc: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward his current target. The grenade explodes on impact dealing 150 magic damage to nearby enemies, and disarms enemies who remain within the smoke cloud for 2 seconds.
ability.name: Smoke Grenade

ability.desc: Heimerdinger fires a wave of 5 rockets that converge on his target, each dealing 70 magic damage to the first target they hit. Every 3rd cast, Heimerdinger summons 3 waves instead.
ability.name: Rocket Swarm

ability.desc: Illaoi slams her target, linking her soul to it for 5 seconds and dealing 175 magic damage. While linked, Illaoi is healed for 25% of the damage taken by her target.
ability.name: Harsh Lesson

ability.desc: Janna summons a Monsoon, knocking back nearby enemies and stunning them for 1.5 second(s). The Monsoon heals your team for 300 Health over 3 seconds.
ability.name: Monsoon

ability.desc:
Melee form: Jayce slams his hammer down onto nearby enemies, dealing damage and reducing their Armor and Magic Resist.
Ranged form: Jayce deploys an acceleration gate, granting bonus Attack Speed to allies in the same row, then fires an orb of electricity at the largest enemy group.
ability.name: Mercury Cannon/Mercury Hammer

ability.desc: Jhin transforms his weapon into a powerful sniper rifle for his next 4 shots. Each shot deals 120% of his Attack Damage as physical damage, reduced by 33% for each target it pierces through. The 4th shot is guaranteed to critically strike, and deals 1 more damage based on his target's missing Health. Passive: Jhin always attacks 0.85 times per second. He converts each 1% of bonus Attack Speed into 0.80 Attack Damage.
ability.name: Curtain Call

ability.desc: Jinx rides her rocket into the sky, then comes crashing down near the center-most enemy, dealing 500 magic damage to enemies around the epicenter, and 50% to all other enemies in a large area. The epicenter burns every unit except Jinx for 5 seconds, dealing 1.5% of the target's maximum Health as true damage, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration. She then swaps to her rocket launcher for the rest of combat, causing her attacks to explode for 75% of her Attack Damage in a small area around her target.
ability.name: Super Mega Death Rocket

ability.desc:
Kai'sa dashes away from all enemies, then fires a volley of 4 missiles spread evenly among all enemies that deal 50 magic damage each.

For each time Kai'Sa has attacked this combat, she'll fire an additional missile.
ability.name: Icathian Monsoon

ability.desc: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at his target, dealing 250 magic damage and granting Kassadin a shield that reduces incoming damage by 35% for 4 seconds. Enemies hit by the orb suffer a 35% increased Mana cost for their next Ability cast.
ability.name: Null Sphere

ability.desc: Katarina blinks behind the enemy with the lowest Health within 3 hexes and slashes all adjacent enemies, dealing 190 magic damage. Katarina gains 20 Mana for each enemy killed by Shunpo.
ability.name: Shunpo

ability.desc: For 3 seconds, Kog'Maw gains infinite Attack Range, 6% Attack Speed, and his attacks deal 0.06 of the target's maximum Health as bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Barrage

ability.desc: Leona calls down a beacon of light upon herself, granting herself a 400 Health shield for 5 seconds. Leona and allies within 2 hexes gain 30 Armor and Magic Resistance for the same duration.
ability.name: Solar Eclipse

ability.desc: Lissandra encases her target in an iron maiden, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and dealing 250 magic damage to enemies within a large area. Damage from the iron maiden reduces enemies' Attack Damage by 40% for 5 seconds. If Lissandra is below 50% Health, she encases herself instead, dealing damage to surrounding enemies and becoming untargetable and invulnerable for 2 seconds.
ability.name: Iron Maiden

ability.desc: Lulu enlarges 2 low Health allies, granting them 350 bonus Health and knocking up enemies near them. If the ally is already enlarged, they are healed instead.
ability.name: Wild Growth

ability.desc: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam towards the farthest enemy target, dealing 200 magic damage. If she kills a unit with her beam, she gains 30 mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc: Malzahar infects the mind of the closest unafflicted target, dealing 700 magic damage over 8 seconds and reducing the Magic Resist of enemies by 40%. If an afflicted target dies, Malefic Visions spreads to the nearest 1 unafflicted targets with the remaining duration.
ability.name: Malefic Visions

ability.desc: Miss Fortune rains 4 waves of bullets down around her target, dealing 275 total magic damage to enemies in the area and reducing their incoming healing by 50% for 6 seconds.
ability.name: Make it Rain

ability.desc: Orianna sends her ball towards the largest group of champions, then commands it to release a shockwave. Allies within 2 hexes gain 100 shield for 4 seconds, while enemies within the area are briefly knocked up and dealt 350 magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the ball are drawn in and stunned for 1.5 seconds.
ability.name: Command: Shockwave

ability.desc: Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing 200% of her Armor as magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks 100 damage.
ability.name: Buckler Toss

ability.desc: Quinn sends Valor out at the target with the highest Attack Speed, dealing 200 magic damage to the target and nearby enemies, disarming them for 2 seconds.
ability.name: Disarming Assault

ability.desc: If a target is adjacent to Samira, she slashes with her blade in a cone towards them dealing 165% of her Attack Damage as physical damage to all enemies within and reducing their Armor by 10. This Armor reduction can stack. Otherwise, she fires an empowered shot at her target with the same effects and gains 20 Mana.
ability.name: Flair

ability.desc: Seraphine projects her song towards the largest group of units dealing 250 magic damage to enemies. Allies it passes through are healed for 250 Health and gain 30% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.
ability.name: Encore

ability.desc: Shaco dips into the shadows, briefly becoming untargetable. His next attack instead deals 175% of his Attack Damage plus 75 bonus physical damage, and is guaranteed to critically strike targets below 50% Health.
ability.name: Deceive

ability.desc: Singed flings a nearby enemy towards the largest cluster of enemies, stunning his target for 0.75 seconds when they land. All adjacent enemies take 50 magic damage and are briefly stunned.
ability.name: Fling

ability.desc: Sion winds up for a moment, then smashes his axe down. All enemies within a large area are knocked up, stunned for 1.5 seconds, and dealt 360 magic damage.
ability.name: Decimating Smash

ability.desc: Swain unleashes piercing bolts of eldritch power in a cone towards his target, dealing 250 magic damage to enemies within and healing Swain for 200 for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Death's Hand

ability.desc:
Tahm Kench devours his target, storing them in his belly and dealing 900 magic damage over 3 seconds. During this time, they are invulnerable to other sources of damage and Tahm Kench takes 40% less damage.

If they die while inside, Tahm Kench either spits out a random component they were holding, or the cost of the unit in gold. Otherwise, he spits them towards the farthest enemy, briefly stunning targets on impact. If a target is immune to crowd control, Tahm Kench will instead deal 325 magic damage.
ability.name: Devour

ability.desc: Passive: Talon's first attack on an enemy causes them to bleed for 450 magic damage over 7 seconds. Every 3rd attack on a target applies an additional bleed.
ability.name: Blade's End

ability.desc: Taric heals himself and the lowest Health ally for 375. Any overhealing is converted to a shield that lasts 4 seconds.
ability.name: Starlight Bastion

ability.desc: Tristana fires a massive cannonball towards her target, dealing 200% of her Attack Damage plus 125 physical damage to the first enemy it hits. If the target is within 2 hexes of Tristana, they're knocked back 1 hexes and briefly stunned.
ability.name: Buster Shot

ability.desc: Trundle bites his target, dealing 140% of his Attack Damage, and reducing the target's Attack Speed by 50% for 3 seconds. Each bite also steals 20 Attack Damage for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Chomp

ability.desc: Twisted Fate throws 3 cards in a cone that deal 140 magic damage to each enemy they pass through.
ability.name: Wild Cards

ability.desc: Twitch fires a powerful bolt towards his target that pierces through enemies, deals 125% of his Attack Damage plus 25 bonus physical damage and reduces healing by 50% for 5 seconds.
ability.name: Piercing Bolt

ability.desc: For the next 5 seconds, Urgot attacks the closest enemy at a fixed rate of 5 attacks per second. (This Ability's damage scales with Attack Damage and Attack Speed.)
ability.name: Purge

ability.desc: Veigar has attack damage of 45 over the course of a few seconds.

Vex shields herself against 400 damage over 4 seconds. When the shield expires, it deals 125 magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes, and an additional 125 damage if it wasn't destroyed. If it was destroyed, Personal Space becomes 25% stronger this combat. This effect can stack.
ability.name: Personal Space

ability.desc: Vi empowers her next attack to blast through her target, dealing 50 magic damage to all enemies in a cone and reducing their Armor by 25% for 8 seconds.
ability.name: Denting Blow

ability.desc: Passive: Viktor's attacks melt his target's defenses, reducing their Armor by 70% for 6 seconds. Viktor summons multiple singularities that fire death rays, which cut across the battlefield in a line. To enemies caught in its path, death rays deal 350 magic damage, destroy 25% of any remaining shields.
ability.name: Chaos Rays

ability.desc: Passive: Warwick's Attacks deal an additional 0.07 of his target's current Health as bonus magic damage, and heal him for 35 health.
ability.name: Eternal Hunger

ability.desc:
Yone summons his spirit to attack an enemy up to 3 hexes away for 4 seconds. The spirit is an untargetable, invulnerable copy of Yone and heals him for 0.40 of the damage it deals.

If Yone dies, his spirit dies with him.
ability.name: Soul Unbound

ability.desc: Yuumi and Book detach and then launch 3 waves toward the farthest enemy, each dealing 45 magic damage and stunning enemies for 0.75 seconds. She then attaches to the nearest ally.
ability.name: Final Chapter

ability.desc: Zac stretches his arms up to 3 hexes to pull the 2 most distant enemies towards him, dealing 50 magic damage.
ability.name: Yoink!

ability.desc: Ziggs hurls a bomb at his target. After a moderate delay, the bomb lands dealing 325 magic damage to the enemy in the epicenter, and half to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Mini Inferno Bomb

ability.desc: Zilean places a bomb on the closest enemy, stunning them for 1.5 seconds. When the stun ends or the target dies, the bomb explodes, dealing 250 magic damage to adjacent enemies and reducing their Attack Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
ability.name: Time Bomb

ability.desc: Zyra summons vines in the row with the most enemies, dealing 350 magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
ability.name: Grasping Spines
